text: Sumori mohho dar nazdi Xudo, dar kitoʙi Xudo az on ruz, ki osmonhovu zaminro ʙijofarida, duvozdah ast. Cahor moh mohhoi haromand. In ast dini durust. Dar on mohho ʙar xestan sitam makuned. Va hamcunon, ki musrikon hamagi ʙa cangi sumo ʙarxostand, hamagi ʙa cangi onho ʙarxezed. Va ʙidoned, ki Xudo ʙo parhezgoron ast
